name: Cheese Ball
author: Shirley Drury

ingredients.name: (8 oz.) pkg. Kraft shredded sharp Cheddar cheese

instructions: Combine cream cheese and Cheddar cheese. Mix well. Add all other ingredients except pecans and mix until well blended. Put the chopped nuts on wax paper, shape cheese mixture into a ball and roll in the nuts. Let chill for a few hours in refrigerator before serving.
